00001 #include "location.hh"
00002 
00003 using namespace mbari;
00004 
00005 void location::update(time_t date, double north, double east) {
00006   point<2> former(m_last_pos);
00007   m_last_pos[0] = north;
00008   m_last_pos[1] = east;
00009 
00010   if( m_valid ) {
00011     long dt = date-m_date;
00012     m_speed = m_last_pos - former;
00013     m_speed /= dt;
00014     m_have_speed = true;
00015   } else {
00016     m_valid = true;
00017     m_have_speed = false;
00018   }
00019   m_date = date;
00020   m_valid = true;
00021 }
00022 
00023 point<2> location::position(time_t now, long int &delta_t) const {
00024   point<2> estimate(m_last_pos);
00025   delta_t = now-m_date;
00026   if( have_speed() )
00027     estimate += m_speed*delta_t;
00028   return estimate;
00029 }
